Description:
Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Clip.exe in Scripts

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Clip
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where command re '(?i)echo.*clip.*&&.*(Clipboard|i`?n`?v`?o`?k`?e`?)'
